name: Heart Liner
description:
Our heart is what keeps us moving. Usually we can't see our own energy source... unless we have an electrocardiograph machine (ECG)! But don't let it run too fast or too slow.

To increase accessibility, this game can be played with only one input. Press the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to control the ECG monitor and your pulse. Ensure your pulse does not get too high or too low. If you hit green obstacles, your pulse goes down. If you hit red obstacles, your pulse goes up. The speed item lets you move straight forward.
